data.name: Game Of The Dead
data.detailed_description: Game of the dead is a twin-stick auto-shooter designed to have rich but minimalistic gameplay. it's your job to escape a large number of zombie hordes in this unique deck-building roguelike. Power up your character with every level you achieve while collecting zombie souls that can be used to purchase cards in Game Of The Dead's unique crafting and building systems. How long will you survive in Nathan Prince's GAME OF THE DEAD!
data.about_the_game: Game of the dead is a twin-stick auto-shooter designed to have rich but minimalistic gameplay. it's your job to escape a large number of zombie hordes in this unique deck-building roguelike. Power up your character with every level you achieve while collecting zombie souls that can be used to purchase cards in Game Of The Dead's unique crafting and building systems. How long will you survive in Nathan Prince's GAME OF THE DEAD!
data.short_description: Gun down large hordes of Zombies and try to survive the night! Game Of The Dead is a casual Post-Apocalyptic Horror game with rogue-lite elements. You can build card decks that will allow you to quickly overcome the odds and help you fight against the thousands of Zombies that get in your way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM / Direct11+ support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM / Direct11+ support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
